=To Do: Utilities=

#Planned, additional utilities

===Reset===
_Stops and destroys iTweens AND reverts GameObjects to their original state._

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.resetAll();
 *iTween.reset(gameObject);
 *iTween.reset(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.resetChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.resetChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)

<hr>

===Stop===
_Stops and destroys iTweens_

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.stopAll();
 *iTween.stop(gameObject);
 *iTween.stop(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.stopChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.stopChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)


<hr>

===Complete===
_Stops, destroys and instantly fast-forwards iTweens to their destination_

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.completeAll();
 *iTween.complete(gameObject);
 *iTween.complete(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.completeChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.completeChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)

<hr>

===Count===
_Returns an int of iTweens_

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.countAll();
 *iTween.count(gameObject);
 *iTween.count(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.countChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.countChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)
